title: Leetcode #989
description: I wrote a Leetcode question titled "Add to Array-Form of Integer" and Leetcode decided to publish it on their site

title: US Patent #62815758
description: In March 2019, I filed and was approved for a provisional patent titled: "Apparatus, Method and Article for Prevention of Proximity-Based Device Authentication within a Defined Radius"

title: No-Name Bot
description: My open source project was used as a source in a paper from Tufts University about the economic impact of Sneakerbots

title: ACT Data Visualization

title: SciKitLearn Contribution
